Uses of Package
graphpack.matching

Packages that use graphpack.matching
graphpack common GraphPack classes
the most important classes are GraphPackService, which manages a GraphPack service and GraphPackClient, which represents a client that can connect to GraphPack services 
graphpack.local local service, client and node abstractions (bridge design pattern) 
graphpack.matching graph path pattern matching facilities 
graphpack.parsing.java contains java interfaces for the PackCypher parser, which is written in scala 
graphpack.remote contains interfaces for remote communication
 
graphpack.remote.rmi contains a concrete RMI implementation of IConnectionManager
ProxyXXXX classes are stubs used for remote access
IProxyXXXXFactory interfaces are needed in order to inject the ProxyXXXX classes
RemotableXXXX classes are RMI exported objects that receive incoming calls
IRemotableXXX interfaces are needed in order to publish the RemotableXXXX classes
 
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack
Matcher
          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
ResultSet
          a multi-set of matched results (the same result can be repeated - in the future this behavior may be customized)
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack.local
Matcher
          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
ResultSet
          a multi-set of matched results (the same result can be repeated - in the future this behavior may be customized)
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack.matching
Matcher
          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
Matcher.Cons
          used to pair two consecutive matchers together, this is vital for making sequences
Predicate
          Represents a check which returns a boolean result
Predicate.BinaryCombinator
          a predicate that combines two inner predicates
Predicate.Comparison
          a predicate that compares two Number instances by using Double.compare(double, double)
Result
          a single matched result
Result.SerializedUnassigned
          a serialized version of Result.Unassigned
Result.Unassigned
          an unassigned value (the value of a name that has not yet been matched)
ResultSet
          a multi-set of matched results (the same result can be repeated - in the future this behavior may be customized)
Value
          represents values in the specified expression
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack.parsing.java
Matcher
          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
Predicate
          Represents a check which returns a boolean result
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack.remote
Matcher
          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
ResultSet
          a multi-set of matched results (the same result can be repeated - in the future this behavior may be customized)
 

Classes in graphpack.matching used by graphpack.remote.rmi

          this is the principle class that is responsible for the pattern matching
ResultSet
          a multi-set of matched results (the same result can be repeated - in the future this behavior may be customized)
